DOC.brief_summary: For HBeAg ( + ) patient , interferon use 12 week . On 12th week treatment , If HBV DNA undetectable ( < 1000 copies/ml ) , interferon continue alone one year . If HBV DNA still positive , nucleoside analogue add 3 month . After nucleoside analogue add 3 month , HBV DNA test . If negative , stop nucleoside analogue use interferon alone another 6 month longer . If HBV DNA still positive , change another nucleoside analogue add another nucleoside analogue .
DOC.brief_title: Early Response Interferon Combined Short-Term Nucleoside Analogue Therapy HBeAg ( + ) Chronic Hepatitis B
DOC.criteria: HBsAg posive 6 month HBeAg positive , HBeAb negative HBV DNA > 1.0×E5 copies/ml ALT > 80 u/L within 3 month pregnant woman conbination infection HCV , HAV , HEV conbination infection HIV contraindication interferon α
